FUNC.NAME: webcodeDecodeGtSubtype
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the webcodeDecodeGtSubtype property.

PARAM.NAME: webcodeDecodeGtSubtype
PARAM.DESC: If true, GT Webcode subtype will be decoded.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner and sets webcodeDecodeGtSubtype property
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="webcode:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="webcodeDecodeGtSubtype:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports Webcode.
